summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2000 FORD F250 HD.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A FORD SAFETY RECALL NOTICE FOR THE VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL IN FEBRUARY OF 2008.  THE SPEED CONTROL WAS DISCONNECTED AT THAT TIME, AND HE HAS BEEN INFORMED EVERY MONTH THEREAFTER THAT THE PART WILL NOT BE AVAILABLE UNTIL THE FOLLOWING MONTH.  THERE HAD BEEN NO FAILURE TO DATE.  THE RECALL NUMBER WAS UNKNOWN.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 57,000.
